abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32701126, pmid32692815, pmid32571717, pmid32657090, pmid32668047, pmid32697005, pmid32696735, pmid32696763, pmid32492712, pmid32700813, pmid32701934, pmid32692858, pmid32696443, pmid32693865, pmid32701460, pmid32700434, pmid32700561, pmid32696489, pmid32470514, pmid32710359
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.07.28
